summary:
In every language solution I provide, I believe in the emotional connection it creates between the product or service of my client and his or her German-speaking target group. 

I believe in the truly appealing effect of a high-quality translation done by a native speaker. 

The way I am providing German language solutions is by adapting the text to the specific target audience, using typical expressions and technical terms of the field of expertise and easy-to-understand sentences. I just happen to write great texts in German which can transform your business. Would you like to work together with me?

Language pairs:

English ► German
Spanish ► German
Dutch ► German
Swedish ► German

About me:

I am a native German Translator, Interpreter & Online Language Coach. My working languages are German (mother tongue), English, Spanish, Dutch and Swedish.

I am appointed as sworn translator and interpreter for English and Spanish by the Higher Regional Court of Dresden (Germany) since 2007 and for German by the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs since 2011.

I have a degree in Translation and Interpreting from the University of Leipzig (Germany) and a degree in Solar Energy and Bioclimatic Architecture from the University Camilo José Cela, Madrid (Spain).

I am specialized in providing translations from English, Spanish, Dutch and Swedish to German in the field of Solar Energy and Bioclimatic Architecture using CAT tools like SDL Trados Studio 2021, memoQ2015, Memsource, Wordbee and Across v6.3.

I provide Language Trainings in Dutch companies and my Online Group Trainings are available worldwide.

Languages are my passion.
